title: In the Shadows of Darkness
description: Come with me into the shadows, where darkness is your friend and your fears only linger in imagination. Step inside a world of the wicked and open yourself up for the unpredictable. Shadows can be a friend to you when the world leaves you alone and cold. Are you ready for the madness? Are you ready to take a walk into the darkness?
author: Jennifer Oneal Gunn
